sect3.title: Configuration Information
sect3.para: The following command will add the qpopper entry to /etc/xinetd.conf:

screen.userinput: cat >> /etc/xinetd.conf << "EOF" service pop { port = 110 socket_type = stream protocol = tcp wait = no user = root passenv = PATH server = /usr/sbin/popper server_args = popper } EOF

sect3.para: Issue a killall -HUP xinetd to reread the changed xinetd.conf file.
